name: Chaseway
description:
Chaseway is a short, top-down, mouse-only puzzle game about building, expanding, and redesigning railway networks to meet management's demands. Construct and demolish stations following strange rules, organize your work to avoid confusion, and enjoy a calm but brief experience about trains - and surely nothing else.

The game features a total of 15 levels.

Note: this is a pet project of mine. This means it was not thoroughly tested, may have some quality issues, has no music, has no digital signature, and probably won't be updated - ever.

Made with Godot, Inkscape, Audacity, Blender and Gimp.
